bibl.title: Three Milestones in the Historiography of Ancient Nubia.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Laurence P. KIRWAN (Sir), Studies on the History of Late Antique and Christian Nubia, edited by Tomas HÄGG, László TÖRÖK and Derek A. WELSBY = Variorum. Collected Studies Series. CS748 (Aldershot - Burlington, 2002); - Jehan DESANGES, Toujours Afrique apporte fait nouveau: Scripta Minora. Édité par Michel REDDÉ (Paris, 1999); - László TÖRÖK, The Image of the Ordered World in Ancient Nubian Art. The Construction of the Kushite Mind, 800 BC - 300 AD = Probleme der Ägyptologie. 18 (Leiden, 2002).
bibl.seg: BURSTEIN Stanley M., Three Milestones in the Historiography of Ancient Nubia.
